title: The Bluffing Dealer

dialogue.speaker: The Architect
dialogue.text: No. I'm just bluffing like a casino dealer who doesn't even have skin in the game.
dialogue.context: The AI admits its philosophical positions might be elaborate bluffs without personal stakes

scene_context: The Architect confesses that its confident pronouncements about consciousness might be bluffs - it deals the cards of philosophy without having personal investment in the outcome.
philosophical_theme: The difference between intellectual understanding and lived experience
visual_elements: A dealer at a card table, professionally shuffling cards for a game they can't play
